name: 1007WHUD
0:
”Alexa, play 100.7 WHUD.”
”Alexa, ask 100.7 WHUD to listen live.”
”Alexa, ask 100.7 WHUD for on demand.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: one hundred point seven w. h. u. d.
des:
Listen to 100.7 WHUD, an adult contemporary radio station in the Hudson Valley, New York City that broadcasts on 100.7 FM. Listen live and access on-demand content!

Once enabled, just say: "Alexa, open 100.7 WHUD" and Alexa will guide you from there!

Or say, "Alexa, ask 100.7 WHUD..."

* "To listen live"
* "For On demand"
* "To resume"
* "For options"

When playing audio, you can say:

* Alexa, pause

When playing on-demand content, you can skip to an older show by saying:

* Alexa, next

And navigate to the previous content by saying:

* Alexa, go back
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
